description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ee6sn","text":"This protocol outlines a method for modulating noradrenergic and dopaminergic neuronal activity in the LC and SNc-VTA, respectively, using Cre-dependent hM3D and hM4D expression. It details stereotactic injection techniques for these chemogenetic tools and the preparation of the J60 agonist for intraperitoneal delivery. Developed for longitudinal studies spanning up to four weeks, the protocol aims to assess neuromelanin's activity-dependent accumulation through daily agonist administration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Chemogenetics, hM4Di, hM3D, DREADDs, long-term modulation,
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"f3r38","text":"Bonaventura J, Eldridge MAG, Hu F, Gomez JL, Sanchez-Soto M, Abramyan AM, Lam S, Boehm MA, Ruiz C, Farrell MR, Moreno A, Galal Faress IM, Andersen N, Lin JY, Moaddel R, Morris PJ, Shi L, Sibley DR, Mahler SV, Nabavi S, Pomper MG, Bonci A, Horti AG, Richmond BJ, Michaelides M. High-potency ligands for DREADD imaging and activation in rodents and monkeys. Nat Commun. 2019 Oct 11;10(1):4627. doi: 10.1038/s41467-019-12236-z. PMID: 31604917; PMCID: PMC6788984.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fe2m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etm0j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"ba4o4","text":"Assess accepted pain management protocol for injected animals, Start experiment as earlyas 3 weeks post-injections","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f68lj","text":"Animals are injected at a dosage of 1mg/kg body weight. Therefore, each aliquot is the maximum for one animal. The injections are intraperitoneal, as shown in the picture. When administering repeated injections, use different locations in the belly to avoid the same injection site. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"elhgs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d29m2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8nn5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ce84e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1io6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9fcr","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E1DD75FEBFA611EEA0560A58A9FEAC02","height":511,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"8slhf\",\"text\":\"Intraperitoneal injection of mice.
